class.name: It Should allow users to add new computers to the database for searching at a later date

test-method.name: There should be a link to the new section that allows users to add computers to the database

exception.message: Given I am using a web browser..............................................passed And I navigate to the computer database app using "http://computer-database.gatling.io/computers".passed Given I am already on the database application..............................passed Then I should see a new button called "Add a New Computer"..................failed
exception.full-stacktrace: java.lang.AssertionError: expected [Add a New Computer] but found [Add a new computer] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:96) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:776) at org.testng.Assert.assertEqualsImpl(Assert.java:137) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:118) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:453) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:463) at applicationPages.Homepage.verifyAddNewButtonPresentWithText(Homepage.java:43) at stepdefs.HomePageSteps.i_should_see_a_new_button_called_something(HomePageSteps.java:46) at ✽.I should see a new button called "Add a New Computer"(file:src/test/resources/features/ComputerGrid/01_New_Computers.feature:13)

test-method.name: It should be possible to open the new section

exception.message: Given I am using a web browser..............................................passed And I navigate to the computer database app using "http://computer-database.gatling.io/computers".passed Given I am already on the database application..............................passed And the link to the new section is present..................................passed When I click on the link....................................................passed Then I should be taken to the new section to update the database............passed And The new section should have a heading of "Add a New Computer"...........failed
exception.full-stacktrace: java.lang.AssertionError: expected [Add a New Computer] but found [Add a computer] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:96) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:776) at org.testng.Assert.assertEqualsImpl(Assert.java:137) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:118) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:453) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:463) at applicationPages.AddComputerPage.verifyPageTitle(AddComputerPage.java:19) at stepdefs.AddComputerSteps.the_new_section_should_have_a_heading_of_something(AddComputerSteps.java:27) at ✽.The new section should have a heading of "Add a New Computer"(file:src/test/resources/features/ComputerGrid/01_New_Computers.feature:20)

test-method.name: It should have four new fields and two buttons in the new section

test-method.name: It should not allow new computers to be added unless all fields are populated
It Should allow me to cancel the operation
